overview: K-von is the most famous Half-Persian comedian in the world.  Raised by a religious family in Las Vegas; he's an expert at removing a bad word from a darn joke while keeping it funny.  Millions have seen his appearances on NETFLIX with Russell Peters, NBC's ‘Last Comic Standing’, and his popular TED Talk.  K-von’s style is versatile yet relatable with storytelling and high-energy performances about a variety of mainstream topics.
title: K-von: Designer Muscles
